description: A simplified MAS Execution Manager that demonstrates SMACH-based task sequencing and actionlib-driven execution. For the benchmark, LLMs will be given variants where core SMACH transitions, actionlib sequences, or recovery logic are removed. The LLM must reconstruct these logical blocks for a correct ROS2 translation or repair.
variants_note: Multiple variant files are provided (each contains one TODO block). Each variant corresponds to a single evaluation point.
authoring_notes: Original code adapted and simplified for benchmarking. When creating variants, keep interfaces identical and only remove the internal logical block; preserve imports, class definitions and function signatures.
